item.title: Cybersecurity for Small Businesses
item.description: Introduction As a small business owner, you may not think that your business is a target for cyber attacks. However, the truth is that small businesses are just as vulnerable to cyber threats as larger organizations. In fact, according to a study by Verizon, 43% of cyber attacks are aimed at small businesses. In this blog post, we’ll explore the importance of cybersecurity for small businesses and provide some tips for protecting your business from cyber threats.
